Staff

Hi!

I am a self-taught Front-End Developer from The Netherlands with a background in communication, photography and design. I spend my workdays happily coding at YoungCapital where our team helps more than 20.000 users every day with the best digital experience possible.

Technologies

Next to HTML and CSS, I started learning Ruby as my first programming language together with Ruby on Rails. My real learning experience started when I became a Front-End Developer and started working full-time in JavaScript, using React.js and the many libraries that support this framework. Each day I learn more, and every day I still feel super happy that I chose to become a programmer.
